definition: the storm put strong grass to the test (idiom); fig. troubled times test a faithful minister/to show one's true colors after a stern test/also written 疾風勁草|疾风劲草
the storm put strong grass to the test (idiom); fig. troubled times test a faithful minister/to show one's true colors after a stern test
the storm put strong grass to the test, fire tests true gold (idiom); fig. troubled times test a faithful minister/to show one's true colors after a stern test
pinyin: ji2 feng1 zhi1 jin4 cao3 , lie4 huo3 jian4 zhen1 jin1
containing_words.word: 疾风知劲草，烈火见真金

sentences.english: Through howling winds and driving rains, To be by your side.
sentences.chinese: 顶着那疾风暴雨，我与你相伴。

sentences.english: He jumped into the icy blast, his static line unhooked .
sentences.chinese: 他跳入冰冷的疾风，他的静态线被解开。

sentences.english: Quick wafting zephyrs vex bold Jim.
sentences.chinese: 疾风使勇敢的吉姆不知所措。

sentences.english: A strong wind blew dust on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 一阵疾风吹起了地上的尘土。

sentences.english: Follow the wind, but watch your back.
sentences.chinese: 且随疾风前行，身后亦须留心。

sentences.english: A true friend is known in the day of adversity.
sentences.chinese: 疾风知劲草，患难知友情。

sentences.english: In a furious storm the little boat was dashed against the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 在疾风暴雨中，这只小船撞在岩石上。

sentences.english: Friend is never known till a man has need.
sentences.chinese: 疾风知劲草，到患难时，才能认识谁是真正的朋友。
